column4: does Vbox-ose support USB now?  i know it didn't used to, thats why i always used the "non-free" one from the vbox repository
i use the non free direct repo as well for that reason
i was just wondering if that changed in Vbox-OSE... doesn't sound like it
i know that oes... i'm talking about OSE edition.
na, only vb /sun direct rocks de usb
he needs to install vb first
vb needs some kernel mods for virtulization, should come with install, not sure why he tried to install them sepratly
i see... is this only required on the OSE install? cuz i didn't do that, i just installed it, and i run XP as a guest just fine
chances are it put them in for you
i guess... i just followed the instructions on virtualbox.org
should not need to install them separately
i dunno, i guess not.. all i know is it gives me an easy way to sync my zune w/o needing to dual boot.
